faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: VibeHub is a social platform where you can connect with others, share posts, like, and comment. It's built with React, Express, and MongoDB.
faq.question2: How do I create an account?
faq.answer2: Click on 'Register' in the navigation menu, fill out your username, email, and password, and you‚Äôll be ready to join the community.
faq.question3: I forgot my password, what should I do?
faq.answer3: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You‚Äôll receive an email with a reset link that expires after 15 minutes.
faq.answer4: Yes. Passwords are encrypted with bcrypt and authentication uses JWT tokens. We never store your raw password.
faq.answer5: Yes. Any post you create can be deleted at any time from your profile or the feed.
faq.answer6: We‚Äôre working on adding friends, groups, and memories features. Stay tuned for updates!
